description.text: You have to perform the AttributeConstructionsWriter experiment before you can use this one. The feature construction descriptions created by this experiment are loaded with help of the #yquot#AttributeConstructionsLoader#yquot# operator. This is especially useful to reuse a automatically determined feature space from other experiments. Please note that these operators should only be used for feature generation purposes. For feature selection, please use the AttributeWeightsWriter and AttributeWeightsLoader operators.
